text: 276 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO POLICIES Policy TC6 Entertainment uses 1. Development proposals for new betting offices/shops (Sui Generis use) will only be supported within the CAZ, Tower Hamlets Activity Areas, Canary Wharf Metropolitan Centre or Secondary Frontages within District Centres where they can demonstrate that: a. the proposed development is not within 400m walking distance of an existing gambling establishment; b. the site is not in close proximity to a school or sensitive community or cultural facility; and c. the proposal would not have a negative impact on the amenity or character of the area. 2.
